title: Just a Bit Captivated
description: A toy for a sheikh.That’s who Aiden Gates a straight guy sold to one of the richest men in the world.What he isn’t is besotted with the cold-hearted, cynical bastard who bought him like a thing. Aiden hates that man. Utterly abhors him.But before long, Aiden’s obsessive hatred starts turning into an obsession, pure and simple–and then into something far worse.Wanting that bastard is bad enough.Needing him is sickening.His feelings aren’t real. He’s a pretty bird in a gilded cage. A dirty little secret.But when the cage is eventually broken, can he learn to live without it? Without him?
author: Alessandra Hazard
